message.content: {"given_definition_quality":30,"better_definition":"useful; helpful","sentence":"这个手机很有用。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation scene showing a person holding a smartphone with glowing icons, clearly looking happy or impressed by its functions. The background is dreamy and softly colored, with subtle hints of a changed world, like faded city structures, to match a soft apocalypse style. The focus is on the phone and the person, radiating a sense of usefulness and modern technology.","sentence_translation":"This smartphone is very useful."}
